prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol is a member of the Ainautes consulting group, which supports the deployment of generative AI around the world. He also develops the WebGPT web page generation service.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, Ainautes, consulting group, generative AI, deployment, WebGPT, web page generation, service
